commitResults.messageBody: Added simple reply functionality to output the input and end the program when a "bye" is detected
Add the ability to add tasks and list out all tasks
Add the ability to Mark and Unmark tasks. Made Task a class on its own, and changed the reply method to use switch cases instead.
Removed unused library and added comments
Functionally the same as previous commit (tag - ACodingStandard), but followed OOP guidelines by splitting responsilbities of each class. (Still work in progress)

commitResults.messageTitle: Add 3 new types of task (Todo, Deadline, Event)
commitResults.messageBody:
Used inheritance to extend the class "Task" into 3 new types of tasks. Added specific variables that each type of task requires in the new classes. Used polymorphism and method overloading so that when the "TaskManager" class requests for getTaskType(), the appropriate task type is returned.

Improved parser so that it methodically splits the text input into the (Input Command, context of text, appropriate deadlines/from/to), allowing for better seperation into different variables (parsing method can be more efficient though)
Used the provided runtest bash file to check if the program's actual output is the same as the expected output. Provided in the commit is the script, input and expected text file

Removed magic numbers and switched them to constants for better context, refactored some lines of text in ParseText to shorten each method length, ensured variables are consistent and made sense to user.

commitResults.messageTitle: Clean code based on PR Reviews
commitResults.messageBody:
Renamed classes ReplyText to InputHandler and ParseText to Parser for better clarity, and made them static with private constructors so no instances can be called. (It didnt make sense for them to have different instances)
Formatted some if else statements to match coding standards

Initialised taskList in main as it made more sense instead of in inputHandler
Broke down textCleaner method in Parser to allow for higher level abstraction
Added a method to reset all the variables in Parser class. Helps with detecting invalid inputs by cleaning up after every input

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error handling for invalid input
commitResults.messageBody: Added ability to detect invalid inputs or incomplete inputs for the tasks. Moved all error checking to Parser Class, combined some methods to clean up and improve logical flow.
Handles exceptions by throwing a custom exception called ParserException whenever an invalid command syntax is provided. (Will add more specific exceptions in the future)
Added 3 new packages, main, task and input (respective classes are inside these packages)
Will add more exceptions in the future
